title: Vice President Biden to Travel to Chicago, Illinois | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




August 18, 2009

 



Vice President Biden to Travel to Chicago, Illinois




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Vice President  ___________________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                       August 18, 2009 **MEDIA ADVISORY**  Vice President Biden to Travel to Chicago, Illinois  Washington, D.C. – On Thursday, August 20, Vice President Biden will travel to Chicago, IL, where he will lead a roundtable discussion with health care professionals on health insurance reform. In Chicago, Vice President Biden will be joined by Health and Human Services Secretary Kathleen Sebelius and Dr. David Blumenthal, National Coordinator for Health Information Technology at Health and Human Services, to discuss our nation’s health care system with doctors, nurses, and hospital administrators at Mt. Sinai Hospital. The Vice President will emphasize the importance of health insurance reform, including health information technology infrastructure and preventative care. This event will be open press. Additional media details are below. Media Details: Vice President Biden to travel to Chicago, Illinois    Event Speakers:  Vice President Biden              Health and Human Services Secretary Kathleen Sebelius               Dr. David Blumenthal, National Coordinator for Health Information Technology, HHS       Date: August 20, 2009       Location:  Sinai Community Institute              Sydney Port Educational Center              2653 West Ogden Street              Chicago, IL 60608       Press Entrance: Main entrance       Sat Truck Parking:  Washtenaw Avenue, directed on site       General Parking:  Main hospital garage, directed on site       Camera preset: 6:30-7:30 AM CDT       Restricted access: 7:30-9:15 AM CDT       Press arrival:  9:15 AM CDT       Final press access:  10:00 AM CDT       Event begins:  10:45 AM CDT       Cable Run:  500 feet       Throw: 25 feet       RSVP:  This event is OPEN PRESS. Media must RSVP with the NAME, POSITION (Reporter, TV Camera, Photog, etc.) MEDIA OUTLET, PHONE AND EMAIL for each person planning to cover the event to press@ovp.eop.gov by Wednesday, August 19, at 4:00 PM CDT. At the event, you will be required to wear your outlet’s media credential at all times, either around the neck or pinned to clothing.    Ground Contact: For press logistics questions, please call Catherine Welker at 202-757-7561
